title: Mac Client 4.15 Patch Doest Open
body:
:( why rito?? 

Ive tried reinstalling the game, and still nothing.

Every time I try to launch the game it sits in the dock. Ive installed deleted reinstalled and downloaded the game again and installed it that way, but no change.

replies.body:
This patch is about 280 megabytes and includes a visual update to the patcher so please be patient :)
The minilauncher (what you see in the dock) is updating the patcher.

Thank you very much for this. i tried again and it worked. maybe next time there is a big change or something like this may happen with an update, you can send out instructions or post them on the website so that we don't freak out or try to fix an error that is not there and cause an actual problem. 
Just a small suggestion :), but again thank you
Same Problem. Plz look into this.
